TEXT: The current amount of Diamond is shown above the energy interface. NL NL You have up to #b10 #yDiamonds. NL NL At the top of the diamond shows some passive and active amount.
Hover the cursor over the #yDiamond to see the specific information.

TEXT: #ySummoner can summon a  #pDemon at the start of battle. NL NL #pDemon will Attack with #ySummoner by different ways.
Demon's attack damage is shown here. NL NL #yOriginal #ySin will Increase this damage.
Hold Left Mouse will #ySacrifice #pDemon. NL NL And #ySummoner will gain different power from #pDemon.
#pSoul #pStone is a kind of unique resource of #ySummoner. NL NL It can be use for play #ySoul #yStone cards. NL NL You have up to #b3 #pSoul #pStones. Obtain #b1 at the start of each combat,
